title: Part 2: Vernon Davis and The Sklar Brothers + News (ACS August 24)
itunes:title: Part 2: Vernon Davis and The Sklar Brothers + News (ACS August 24)
description:
Twin comedians, Randy and Jason Sklar, return to the studio and join the gang as they talk to former NFL tight end and current actor, Vernon Davis. Vernon talks about his time playing in the NFL, Peyton Manning, and acting as a serial killer in an upcoming Morgan Freeman movie. The Sklar brothers talk to Adam about their new show, ‘The Nosebleeds’, where they comment on old UFC footage. Gina Grad reports the news of the day including: Gary Busey being charged with multiple sexual offenses, Tommy Lee revealing he released the nude picture of himself, Kathy Hilton mistaking Lizzo for ‘Precious’, Elton John scoring a Tammy Faye musical, and Elton John previewing his new Britney Spears song. 

THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:

Con-Cret.com/PODCAST

Geico.com

Offers.AmericanHartfordGold.com/ADAM
